div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 70px; margin-left: 186px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 130px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: Listens for API requests over HTTP on predefined routes. This gateway will delegate to the appropriate service and await the response.

div.div:
Services should be scalable horizontally.
Multiple consumers of the same kind can co-exist

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 343px; margin-left: 190px;

div.p: Application requires a NoSQL database and S3 compatible file store. Data management pods interact with these in their respective manners. The data apps can be containerized if desired
